entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as a ghost or an echo who spoke to Harry. He was a victim of Voldemort's wand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who interacts with Cedric's echo and discusses the echoes with Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore explains to Harry that the echoes are retained forms of victims of Voldemort's wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who performed the murders with his wand.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins is an old man who was a victim of Voldemort's wand.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather and is present during the conversation with Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore explains that Voldemort performed the murders with his wand.
Harry mentions Bertha Jorkins as a victim of Voldemort's wand.
Dumbledore explains the concept of echoes to Harry.
